## Environment type

A set of environment variables for a [Container](./cloud.container.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Environment = EnvPair[] | EnvSimple;
```

## Remarks

See the [Docker API Reference](https://docs.docker.com/engine/api/v1.40/#operation/ContainerCreate) for more information.
